info.headerText: My first attempt at using pygame to make something. Didn't turn out that awful if you ask me...
info.description: Just a really simple version of a Pokémon battle. I only had like half a week to work on this so it isn't quite as polished as I'd like it to be, but it's good enough for now. The only dependency is pygame - other than that, if you're running Python 3.6+ you shouldn't have any issues. Only has Pokémon from Bulbasaur to Ekans. Oh, and Pikachu.
info.knwnBgs: There is a slight chance it may decide that it doesn't want to be closed unless the battle's over. A slight chance.
